name: Wizard O´ Three Pieces
description:
Is touching a cactus a bad thing? Not in this game. You may lose a part of your body, but it´s still progress, because if you want to win, you have to lose every part of your body. Eventually you´ll come across hay bales you need to push.. and even portals? 
Sounds interesting? Give this game a try.

Game is made for Wowie Jam 3.0 with my friend Monni(art, music and level desing). and help for ideas and inspiration from Nils 

Controls: Arrows, or WASD, R resets level
